name: Friendango
description: Friendango is a social network for movie reviews with charts that analyze the popularity, average scores, and score distributions.

name: CarFree
description: CarFree allows users to input their destination and receive a hyper-local forecast for the duration of their travel.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: An app allowing users to compile a list of burgers they hope to eat and which from the list they have eaten using Express Handlebars.

name: Budget Tracker
description: The Budget Tracker allows users to to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without an internet connection.
